title: ‘Far From Ideal’: Kuss Crashes a Second Time as Massive Burgos Pileup Sees Geoghegan Hart, August DNF
content:
Sepp Kuss crashes for second day in a row as several riders slammed to the ground with about 35km to go in the second stage of the Vuelta a España warmup race.

Read the full article at ‘Far From Ideal’: Kuss Crashes a Second Time as Massive Burgos Pileup Sees Geoghegan Hart, August DNF on Velo.
author: ahood
